]]> Amy Held Rio Carnival: When Brazil Lets Out Its Mysterious 'Inner Chicken' "There are people who go through life until they are 80 or 90 years old, desperate to let out their chicken. ]]> Philip Reeves PHOTOS: Highlights Of Week 1 At The Pyeongchang Winter Olympics By the end of the first week, Norway's team led in medals, with 19. ]]> Carrie Kahn Tongan Skier Finishes Strong In Olympics After Just 12 Weeks Of Training In Snow Shirtless flag-bearer Pita Taufatofua, a Rio taekwondo competitor turned Pyeongchang cross-country skier, came in 114th on Friday. His goal was simply to finish the race (and not hit a tree). Shirtless flag-bearer Pita Taufatofua, a Rio taekwondo competitor turned Pyeongchang cross-country skier, came in 114th on Friday. His goal was simply to finish the race (and not hit a tree).
